It's honored to take this course since the lecture contents are well-tailored and the interaction in class is enjoyable. Instead of absorbing knowledge from text books, realistic practices are carried out a lot. Thank you Professor!
Professor Park is a nice and kind teacher! This course is presented with lots of discussions and meaningful activities, which is great to me.
I really enjoyed the course haha
Thank Steven very much, I think that present in English is not a really easy thing to prepare, but I have tried my best both in marketing class and ethics class.

Professor Park gave students a lot of opportunities of communicating and putting knowledge into practice! Although students may not be familiar with his teaching style at first, they will definitely grow and learn a lot from this class!
